articles.author: Adam Cooper
articles.title: What Hamilton learned from following Verstappen in F1 US GP - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Lewis Hamilton has elaborated on what he learned following Max Verstappen’s Red Bull in the Formula 1 United States Grand Prix, noting it looked easier to drive than his Mercedes.
articles.content:
Hamilton finished 2.2 seconds behind Verstappen in last Sunday's main race in Austin, prior to being disqualified for an excessively worn plank.
After both the sprint race and the grand prix in the … [+3276 chars]
